summary: Predators top Wild as Forsberg, Jones get first points

pbp.summary: J. Spurgeon (1) Wrist Shot, assists: N. Niederreiter (2), M. Granlund (3)
F. Forsberg (1) Snap Shot, assists: P. Hornqvist (2), S. Jones (1)
Z. Parise (3) Tip-In, assists: M. Koivu (2), R. Suter (2)
K. Klein Wrist Shot saved by N. Backstrom
J. Pominville Slap Shot saved by P. Rinne
E. Nystrom (1) Wrist Shot, assists: none
C. Wilson (1) Wrist Shot, assists: M. Cullen (1), M. Fisher (2)
